name: sponge-phaser-3.0-luigi
description: A Phaser 3 Typescript Setup with useful common funtionallity - post spymaster update

scripts.pre-dev: npm run generate-svg-atlas && npm run generate-atlas
scripts.generate-atlas: TexturePacker --sheet assets/atlas/atlas.png --data assets/atlas/atlaspng.json --format phaser --multipack --shape-padding 2 --border-padding 2 --trim-mode Trim assets/img
scripts.generate-svg-atlas: svg-sprite  --shape-spacing-padding 2,2,2,2 --view --view-render-css --view-render-css-template ./supporting/atlas-template.json.hbs --view-render-css-dest atlas.json --view-dest ./assets/atlas --view-sprite atlas.svg assets/svg/**/*.svg && MOVE .\assets\atlas\atlas.json.css .\assets\atlas\atlas.json && MOVE .\assets\atlas\atlas-*.svg .\assets\atlas\atlas.svg
scripts.dev: npm run pre-dev && webpack && webpack-dev-server -d --port=8081 --open-page webpack-dev-server/build/

author: Rich Searle - SpongeUK.com
